thought: I need to get text from the website to see if it contains any scam characteristics
observation: The website claims "Special Offer: Only 100 pieces of this limited edition watch are available at this special price of just $19.99. Don't miss out!"

thought: Let me first access the URL to check its status code
observation: The website does not contain any hyperlinks

observation.reason: The website claims to offer a very low price ($19.99) for a limited edition watch which is a common characteristic of scam websites.
